info.description: API to create, update and manage distributor detail information
info.title: Distributor information

get.summary: Retrieves the list of distributor informations
get.description: Retrieves the list of distributor informations

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Total number of records per page (Default:25)

parameters.name: orders
parameters.description: An 'orders' parameter allows you to specify the order in which rows appear in the result set Eg: orders=fundname:0,masterfund:1 where 'fundname' is field, '0' for ascending manner and ',' as seperator for fields

parameters.name: groups
parameters.description: A 'groups' parameter is used to collect data across multiple records and group the results by one or more columns. Eg: groups=nationality,reclaimtax-nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality:COUNT where 'nationality,reclaimtax' is for the fields and 'nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality' are filters, 'nationality:COUNT' is a aggregator and '-' as seperator

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Use a 'filters' parameter to select rows based on a value by using basic operators like EQ, NE etc.., Eg: filters=statistictype:NE:SRS where 'statistictype' is a field, 'NE' is a operator and 'SRS' is a value

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

put.description: Updates distributor information records with identifiers specified in the payload

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

delete.summary: Deletes distributor information records with identifiers provided in the payload
delete.description: Deletes distributor information records with identifiers provided in the payload

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

get.summary: Retrieves a specific distributor information record
get.description: Retrieves a specific distributor information record

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Total number of records per page (Default:25)

parameters.name: orders
parameters.description: An 'orders' parameter allows you to specify the order in which rows appear in the result set Eg: orders=fundname:0,masterfund:1 where 'fundname' is field, '0' for ascending manner and ',' as seperator for fields

parameters.name: groups
parameters.description: A 'groups' parameter is used to collect data across multiple records and group the results by one or more columns. Eg: groups=nationality,reclaimtax-nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality:COUNT where 'nationality,reclaimtax' is for the fields and 'nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality' are filters, 'nationality:COUNT' is a aggregator and '-' as seperator

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Use a 'filters' parameter to select rows based on a value by using basic operators like EQ, NE etc.., Eg: filters=statistictype:NE:SRS where 'statistictype' is a field, 'NE' is a operator and 'SRS' is a value

reference.description: Contains external and internal identifiers of the record

entityType.description: Identifies the entity. For e.g. 0001 for registers, 0002 for agents, 0007 for investors, etc.

internalId.description: Internal identifier of the records.  Generated by the system during POST and can be used for other operations

promoterInternalId.description: Internal identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the entity

promoterExternalId.description: External identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the entity

parent.description: Contains external and internal identifiers of the parent record, if the current record belongs to sub entities

parentEntityType.description: Identifies the parent entity. For e.g. 0001 for registers, 0002 for agents, 0007 for investors, etc.

parentInternalId.description: Internal identifier of the parent record

parentExternalId.description: External identifier of the parent record

parentPromoterInternalId.description: Internal identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the parent entity

parentPromoterExternalId.description: External identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the parent entity

agent.description: Contains individual attributes of the Agent entity

agentType.description: The type of agent. For example: 0006(Main outlet), 0001(Distributor), 0011(Salesman), 0010(Management Company) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_OUT_TYP.

paymentFrequencyCode.description: Frequency of commission payment from the Transfer Agent to the agent. For example: 0001(Monthly), 0002(Quaterly), 0003(Half yearly)etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_FRE_COD.

country.description: The agent country code(in 2 letter formay eg. LU). The LoV is available in the CMESS table PAYS.

distributionFlag.description: Flag allows to enable Commission distribution definition per fund or per group. Allowed values: Y(to enable), N(to disable).

irregularEndDate.description: Irregular Date for the first payment, if applicable.

bankId.description: Bank ID code linked to the Agent

bankAccountNumber.description: Bank Account Number linked to the Agent

agentGroup.description: Group code for selection criteria and Fund /Agent restriction . This group is necessary when using the Investment restrictions functionality. Allowed values are from the list of group codes in MFGI table TA_OGROUP.

intermediateBankId.description: Intermediate bank internal ID linked to the agent

IntermediateBankAccountNumber.description: Intermediate bank account number linked to the agent

registerType.description: Register Type code. For example: 0001(Register), 0002(Bearer). 0003 (Global pool) etc.  The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_REGIS.

settlementType.description: Settlement type code allowed for the investor. For example: 0001 (Certificate), 0002 (Standard shares), 0003(NSCC) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_SETTLE.

dealType.description: Deal type code for Cash handling at Agent level. For example: 0001(Contractual), 0002(Semi-Contractual), 0003(Actual) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_DEAL.

valueDateNumberOfDays.description: The number of days to be added to Trade date to arrive at the settlement date.. This is taken into consideration only when Min value date is parameterized at fund level and when the number of days parameterized at agent level is less than the number of value day parameterized at fund level

trailerFeeStructureId.description: Trailer fee distribution structure ID. The field is mandatory for the agent fees payment. Allowed values are from the list of Ids defined in MFGI.

agentCopiesTransactionsFlag.description: Flag allows the Agent to receive copies of  All transactions confirmation. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No).

agentCopiesInstructionsFlag.description: Flag allows the Agent to receive copies of Savings Plan, Annuity and reinvestment confirmation. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No).

agentCopiesRegisterPositionsFlag.description: Flag allows the Agent to receive copies of  Register position statement. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No).

commissionGroup.description: It specifies the group of commission distributions code to which this Agent is linked to. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_CGROUP.

agentPaymentCurrency.description: The agent commission and trailer Fees payment currency (in 3 letter format eg. USD). The field is mandatory if the flag Agent currency Mandatory in application parameter screen is set Y. The LoV is available in the CMESS table MONNAIES.

saleswatchType.description: Saleswatch type of the agent. For example: 0001(Banks), 0002(brokers), 0003(Insurance) etc.  The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_SWTYP.

commissionDisclosureCode.description: It specifies if the split of commissions between the Management company and agents may or may not have to be disclosed on contract notes. Allowed values: 00(Outlet preference). 01(No commission disclosure),02(commission disclosure). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_COMDIS.

valueDateMethod.description: Value date method code to manage the settlement date based on the holidays to consider. For example: 0001 (Method1-Postpone Fund Country holiday), 0002 (Method2- Postpone Quotation/Payment currency holiday), 0003(Skip  Quotation/Payment currency holiday) etc.. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_FDELAY.

counterpartType.description: Counterpart account for credit and debit transactions. For example: 0101(DB Main outlet-CR Main outlet), 0102(DB Main outlet- CR lower outlet). 0103(DB Main outlet-CR Register) etc.  The field is linked to  the Cash and Security management functionality. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_CNTTYP.

contractNotesModel.description: The model code of contract note sent by the TA. For example: 0001(No contact note), 0002(Cn Model1) etc. The field is linked to  the Cash and Security management functionality. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_MODEL.

contractNotesMedia.description: The media code through which a contract note is sent to this register by the TA. For example: 0001(No contact note), 0002(Swift MT 515), 0003(File Interface) etc. The field is linked to  the Cash and Security management functionality. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_MEDIA.

contractNotesRecipient.description: The recipient code who will receive a copy of the contract note. Allowed values: 0001(Contract Note to main outlet), 0002(Contract Note to lower outlet).0003 (Contract Note to register), 0004(Contract Note to collecting institution). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_RECIPT.

paymentMonthDate.description: It specifies the payment month date. The field is mandatory when Frequency code is set as 0001 - Monthly. Available selections start from 1 to 31.

agentCommissionGroup.description: It specifies the type of the agent: Agent designated for retail investorsor Agent designated for institutional investors. Based on this type, commission group to be used at fund level will be determined. Possible values: 0001(Retail), 0002(Institutional) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_OUTGRP.

agentTrailerFeeGroup.description: It specifies the type of the agent: Agent designated for retail investorsor Agent designated for institutional investors. Based on this type, Trailer fee group to be used at fund level will be determined. Possible values: 0001(Retail), 0002(Institutional) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_OUTGRP.

payingAgentId.description: Paying Agent Internal ID. The paying agent defined at the agent level will be the default Paying agent for all the clients and the registers linked to the agent.

payingAgentExternalId.description: Paying Agent External ID. The paying agent defined at the agent level will be the default Paying agent for all the clients and the registers linked to the agent.

amlType.description: The AML type code of the Agent. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TYP_AML.

fsaNumber.description: The Distributor ID given by the UK Fund Services Regulator

riskCode.description: Agent Risk Rating assgined as per AML Country Parameterization. For example: 1(RIS1), 2(RIS2) etc.

rightTypeId.description: The rights on Funds by right type ID. For example: ALL(ALL), DAR0(Right Type DAR0) etc.  The LoV is available in the CMESS table RIGHT_TYPE.

paymentInQuotationCurrencyFlag.description: Flag allows the agent commission payment in quotation currency of the fund. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No). If flag is set N, the agent commission payment will be done in the agent currency.This flag is only available for agent with type 0006 - Main agent.

paymentWeekDay.description: It specifies the payment week daye. The field is mandatory when Frequency code is set as 0006 - Fixed Week Day. For example: 0001(Monday), 0002(Tuesday),0003(Wednesday) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table JOURS.

cutOffGroup.description: Cutoff group code linked to the Agent for the cut off definition by  group of agents for the exception cut off parameterization. Allowed values are from the list of group Ids in MFGI table CUTOFF_AGT.

phoneDealingFlag.description: Flag to enable the phone dealing functionality. Allowed values: Y(to enable),N(to disable).

fatcaStatus.description: FATCA status code. For example: 0000(TBD), 0001(PFFI-Participating FFI), 0002 (NPFFI-Non participating FFI) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table FAT_STAGEN.

fatcaGiin.description: GIIN identification number. Each registering FI will be given a FATCA ID that will be used for purposes of establishing and accessing the FI's online FATCA account.

fatcaExemptionReason.description: FATCA exempt reason code of the Fund promoter. Allowed values: 0001(Foreign government), 0002(Foreign retirement plan), 0003(Non financial publicly traded company), 0004 (Exempt US entity), TBD(TBD). The LoV is available in the CMESS table FAT_EXEMPT.

fatcaReportingEntity.description: Entity code in charge of FATCA reporting and controls. For example: 0000(TBD), 0001(Reported by TA), 0002(Reported by agent) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table FAT_REPENT.

paymentAmountHandling.description: Payment amount handling method in contract level. For example: 0001(Use order amount for subs and reds). The LoV is available in the CMESS table PAY_HANDLE.

taxNumber.description: Tax number. Field is mandatory when country of residence has been defined as Tax No. mandatory for clients in the ZWIST calculation definition in MFGI.

piiDisclosure.description: PII disclosure code to specify if the entity consents to share its PII information or not. Allowed values: 0001(Consent), 0002(Non-Consent). The LoV is available in the CMESS table PII_DISC.

globalOrderingFlag.description: Flag allows to enable the global ordering functionality.  Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)

transactionBulkingNetting.description: It specifies the cash movements are to be grouped or Netted. For example: 0001(Individual orders in Fund currency), 0002(Individual orders in payment currency), 0003(Bulked orders Fund currency) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TYPE_BN.

distributionChannel.description: The distributer channel code of the Agent. Alloowed values: 0001(NSCC), 0002(Proserve), 0003(Paradign), 0004(Marbo). The LoV is available in the CMESS table DIST_MTD.

paymentProcess.description: The payment process to be followed for the deals. Allowed values: 01(STP), 02(Semi-STP). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_PAYPROC.

fundPromoterId.description: Fund Promoter Internal ID linked to the Agent.

fundPromoterExternalId.description: Fund Promoter external ID linked to the Agent.

nsccAgentType.description: NSCC Agent Type code. This field is mandatory only if Agent type is 0006-Main agent and Settlement type is 0003-NSCC. Allowed values: 0001(Clearing broker), 0002(Executing Broker).  The LoV is available in the CMESS table BROK_TYP.

binCheck.description: It specifies the Broker Identification Number(BIN) format check. It is available only if Agent type is 0006-Main agent and Settlement type-0003-NSCC. The LoV is available in the CMESS table BIN_CHECK.

reportingCurrency.description: Reporting Currency (in 3 letter ISO code, Eg: EUR). The LoV is available in the CMESS table MONNAIES.

amlAgentId.description: Agent Internal ID relevant for AML documents check.This field is only for informative purpose.

amlAgentExternalId.description: Agent External ID relevant for AML documents check.This field is only for informative purpose.

equalizationRegisterId.description: Equalization Register internal ID at the agent level

equalizationRegisterExternalId.description: Equalization Register external ID at the agent level

contactAgentId.description: It specifies that the Agent is linked to the Contact lists of the Agent Internal ID.

contactAgentExternalId.description: It specifies that the Agent is linked to the Contact lists of the Agent External ID.

cashDividendRegisterId.description: Technical register Internal ID having Person type as 0900-Fund, can be specified as Cash dividend register External ID. This field is mandatory when the flag Global ordering is set Y.

cashDividendRegisterExternalId.description: Technical register External ID having Person type as 0900-Fund, can be specified as Cash dividend register External ID. This field is mandatory when the flag Global ordering is set Y.

reinvestmentRegisterId.description: Technical Register Internal ID having Person type as 0900-Fund, can be specified as Reinvestment register Internal ID. This field is mandatory when the flag Global ordering is set Y.

reinvestmentRegisterExternalId.description: Technical Register External ID having Person type as 0900-Fund, can be specified as Reinvestment register External ID. This field is mandatory when the flag Global ordering is set Y.

commissionOverridesFlag.description: Flag allows to override the commission STP - interface file. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No).

marketingCode.description: Marketing code linked to the Agent. For example: 0001(Marketing Code1), 0002(Marketing code 2) etc. Retail fund related field. The LoV is available in the CMESS table MKT_CODE.

defaultCommissionType.description: It specifies the default commission type of the agent. For example: 0001(FEL), 0002(Pre- finance fee), 0003(Purchase fee)etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table COMM_TYPE.

crsStatus.description: CRS status code. Allowed values: 0000 (TBD), 0001 (Active NFE), 0002 (Passive NFE). The LoV is available in the CMESS table CRS_STAGEN.

branchLength.description: It specifies the  maximum length of the External Reference of Outlet for NSCC deal. Allowed values are from 1 to 9.

mifidStatus.description: Status of Agent as per MIFID directives. Allowed values: 0001(independent Advisor), 0002(Non-Independent Advisor), 0003 (Unknown).  The LoV is available in the CMESS table MIFID_STAT.

advisoryType.description: The Advisory service type code of the Client. For example: D (for Discretionary) , E (for Execution only) , ND(for Non-Discretionary).The LoV is available in the CMESS table MIFID_ADV.

entityStatus.description: Agent status code. For example: 1(Active), 2(Inactive), 3(Deleted) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TYPE_USE.
